column2:
Roadmap Noviembre
Track statuses, communicate your plans, and align team expectations. The Timeline 2 gantt
chart is connected to the Feature list , so when you make a change in one place, it will be
reflected in the other—keeping all your critical information up-to-date. To help your team know
what they’re working towards, add milestones (which only have start dates, but no end dates).
